about.subtitle: About Us
about.title: Who We Are
about.heroDescription: Your trusted partner for premium transfer services in Marseille and the PACA region

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: MassiliaDrive was founded with a simple mission: to provide exceptional transfer services that combine luxury, reliability, and professionalism. Since our inception, we have been committed to exceeding our clients' expectations.
story.paragraph2: With experienced drivers in the passenger transfer industry, we have built a reputation for excellence in the Marseille region. Our team of professional drivers and premium fleet ensure that every journey is comfortable, safe, and punctual.
story.paragraph3: We specialize in airport transfers, business transfer, city rides, and tourist tours, serving both individual clients and corporate partners throughout the PACA region.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To provide premium, reliable, and professional transfer services that exceed our clients' expectations while maintaining the highest standards of safety, comfort, and discretion.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To become the leading VTC service provider in the Marseille region, recognized for our excellence and commitment to customer satisfaction.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: We strive for excellence in every aspect of our service, from vehicle maintenance to driver professionalism.

commitment.title: Our Commitment
commitment.description: We are committed to providing personalized service tailored to each client's unique needs and preferences.

values.title: Our Values
values.description: The principles that guide everything we do

punctuality.title: Punctuality
punctuality.description: We understand the importance of time. Our drivers are trained to arrive on time, every time, ensuring you never miss an appointment or flight.

safety.title: Safety First
safety.description: Your safety is our top priority. All our vehicles are regularly maintained, fully insured, and our drivers undergo rigorous safety training.

quality.title: Premium Quality
quality.description: We maintain a fleet of premium vehicles equipped with the latest amenities to ensure your comfort throughout your journey.

service.title: Exceptional Service
service.description: Our professional drivers are multilingual, discreet, and dedicated to providing you with an exceptional travel experience.

stats.title: VTC Marseille in Numbers
stats.description: Expertise in passenger transfer with quality service recognized throughout the Marseille region

whyChoose.title: Why Choose Us?
whyChoose.description: What sets us apart from the competition

experience.title: Experienced Drivers
experience.description: With experienced drivers in the industry, we have the expertise and knowledge to handle any transfer need.

fleet.title: Premium Fleet
fleet.description: Our modern fleet includes hybrid and electric vehicles, all regularly maintained and equipped with the latest amenities.

drivers.title: Professional Drivers
drivers.description: Our multilingual drivers are licensed professionals with extensive training in safety and customer service.

availability.title: 24/7 Availability
availability.description: We are available around the clock to serve you, whether for early morning airport transfers or late-night events.

pricing.title: Competitive Pricing
pricing.description: We offer transparent, competitive pricing with no hidden fees, ensuring you get the best value for your money.

coverage.title: Wide Coverage Area
coverage.description: We serve the entire Marseille region and PACA, including airport transfers, city rides, and tourist tours.

cta.title: Ready to Experience Premium Transfer?
cta.description: Contact us today to book your ride or request a personalized quote

footer.description: MassiliaDrive - Professional chauffeur transfer service. Specialized in airport transfers, business transfer and private events in the Marseille region.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.subtitle: Your data, our priority
privacyPolicy.description: Review our privacy policy regarding the collection, use, and protection of your personal data.

1.title: 1. Data Collection
1.content: We do not collect any personal data through our website. Contact information is used solely to respond to your requests.

2.title: 2. Use of Data
2.content: Data is used only to contact you, confirm a booking, or send information related to your order.

3.title: 3. Data Sharing
3.content: We do not share your data with any third parties, except if required by law.

4.title: 4. Your Rights
4.content: You can request access, modification, or deletion of your data at any time by contacting us.

5.title: 5. Cookies
5.content: We do not use cookies to track your browsing activity.

termsAndConditions.title: Terms and Conditions
termsAndConditions.subtitle: Basic rules
termsAndConditions.description: Review our terms and conditions for using our VTC service in Marseille.

1.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
1.content: Using this service implies acceptance of these terms without reservation.

2.title: 2. Bookings
2.content: Bookings must be confirmed 24 hours in advance. Cancellation fees may apply for late cancellations.

3.title: 3. Responsibilities
3.content: We are not responsible for delays caused by external circumstances (traffic, accidents, etc.).

4.title: 4. Payment
4.content: Payment is made online or in cash. Credit cards are welcome.

5.title: 5. Changes
5.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Users will be informed accordingly.
